=== General ===
All Tools listed target the .Net Framework 3.5

====1.0.1.1 _07/12/2009_====
 * First public version.

==!ChromeAppGen version history==
=== Summary ===
!ChromeAppGen generates a Chrome App to login to your PRTG Server. [http://code.google.com/p/prtg-addons/wiki/PTF_Tools_ChromeAppGen details]
 
 back to [#Latest_versions: top]
====9.0.1.2 _19/09/2011_====
 * First public version.

----

==CSVImport version history==
=== Summary ===
CSVImport lets you build graphs based on .csv files generated by CVSExport, or by selecting sensors from your PRTG server. [http://code.google.com/p/prtg-addons/wiki/PTF_Tools_CSVImport details]

 back to [#Latest_versions: top]
====9.0.1.1 _02/10/2011_====
 * Bugfix: with PRTG 9 a read-only user was presented with a corrupted treeview, causing graphs not to be created anymore.
====8.0.4.1 _26/06/2011_====
 * Changed: the export xml now contains more detailed information.
 * New: option to show "month only" on the x-axis.
 * New: option to log errors to disk.
 * Bugfix: several small bug fixes.
====8.0.3.1 _12/05/2011_====
 * New: bar graphs are created when all channels have a "%" unit.
 * New: option to change legend texts from the main menu.
 * New: option to sort channels in the channel selector window.
 * New: changes to the layout of the graph are automatically saved.
 * New: option to load/save the selected time period, sensors and channels from/to a xml file.
 * New: option to fully automate CSVImport. CSVImport takes two parameters, the first one for the import (xml) file and the second one for the output (image) file. E.g. CSVImport “c:\temp\test.xml” “c:\temp\test.png”
====8.0.2.1 _13/04/2011_====
 * New: added an option to show "date only" on the X-Axis
====8.0.1.1 _07/11/2010_====
 * Compiled the CSVImport Tool for PRTG V8

----

==Distribute Sensors version history==
=== Summary ===
PTF Distribute Sensors is a tool used to distribute (updates of) custom sensors to your PRTG Probes. [http://code.google.com/p/prtg-addons/wiki/PTF_Distribute_Sensors details]

 back to [#Latest_versions: top]

====1.0.3.1 _14/02/2011_====
 * New: Added support for EXEXML sensors.
 * New: Select multiple sensors to send to your Probes.
 * Changed: Various changes in the userinterface.
 * Changed: moved the installers to !InstallShield
====1.0.2.1 _28/12/2009_====
 * Changed: Although data is send encrypted between GUI and web service, the encryption was always the same. In theory, encrypted credentials could be reused. With this version, the encryption changes in each session, preventing encrypted credentials to be reused.

====1.0.1.1 _07/12/2009_====
 * First public version.

==!ListQueues version history==
=== Summary ===
With this tool you can list MSMQ's, !PrintQueues, Scheduled Tasks and EventLogs on a given Windows computer. [http://code.google.com/p/prtg-addons/wiki/PTF_Tools_ListQueues details]

 back to [#Latest_versions: top]

====1.0.3.1 _17/04/2011_====
 * New: added support for !TaskScheduler V2 (Vista and above)
 * Bugfix: "Show password as plain text" option did not work.
====1.0.2.1 _09/04/2011_====
 * New: added option to list Scheduled Tasks.
====1.0.1.2 _01/03/2011_====
 * Changed: small changes in the user interface.
====1.0.1.1 _16/02/2011_====
 * First public version

==Translate version history==
=== Summary ===
PTF Translate is a tool used to create new language files for PRTG Network Monitor as well as for the !TrayNotifier. [http://code.google.com/p/prtg-addons/wiki/PTF_Tools_Translate details]

 back to [#Latest_versions: top]

====2.0.1.1 _12/04/2012_====
 * New: Added support for PRTG V12 language files. When opening an old language file, you are asked to convert it to the new format.
====1.0.6.2 _04/12/2011_====
 * Changed: Moved translator engine from Google Translate to Microsoft Bing Translator as Google no longer supports free (non payed for) translations with its API. (you need to register for a free Microsoft Translator account to get the translator engine working).
 * New: Option to email language files.
 * New: Option to check for variables being correctly implemented in the translated strings.
 * New: Option while merging, to automatically translate new strings that have been translated before.
====1.0.5.1 _06/06/2010_====
 * Changed: Compiled the executable with Visual Studio 2010.
 * Changed: Modified the search for updates.
 * Changed: Build the installer using !InstallShield.

----

==!TrayNotifier version history==
=== Summary ===
The !TrayNotifier is installed in the system tray, presenting the PRTG icon. When an alarm condition occurs, the icon becomes a flashing red dot. Right-clicking the icon, pops up a menu with various actions. [http://code.google.com/p/prtg-addons/wiki/PTF_Tools_TrayNotifier details]

 back to [#Latest_versions: top]
====12.3.4.4 _05/08/2012_====
 * New: Option to set the fontsize in the alarms window
 * New: Option to (only) retrieve alarms/warnings/...
 * Changed: a maximum of 2000 records are now retreive from PRTG (was 500)
 * Various small bug fixes and improvements.
====9.0.2.1 _13/12/2010_====
 * New: Option to not popup the tray balloon when a new alarm occurs
 * Bugfix: HTML decoder did not decode the apostrophe (‘) correctly and showed &apos; instead
====9.0.1.3 _10/10/2010_====
 * Changed: Implemented PRTG9 icons and features.
 * Bugfix: Auto update did not work anymore.
 * Bugfix: Due to the enhanced security in PRTG v9, opening a sensor page from the !TrayNotifier did not work anymore.
====8.0.2.1 _22/03/2010_====
 * Bugfix: Checking for updates did not work anymore and stole the focus from other applications.
 * New: Option to force a SSL3 connection to your PRTG Server
====8.0.1.1 _31/08/2010_====
 * Compiled the !TrayNotifier for PRTG V8
